name: ESCAPE FROM TINY ISLAND
description:
Two homies are on a tiny island, and their only way to escape is to build a bridge.

The bad news: There's only one bridge piece around.

The good news: When monsters die, they turn into wood, and one of the homies is a summoner!

Fight your way through... a couple monsters, build a (horizontal) bridge, and ESCAPE THE TINY ISLAND!!

(Honestly, this is mostly a prototype/getting back into RPGMaker conditional flows. There shouldn't be many bugs, but it's quite a tiny game with restricted functionality due to time constraints. Happy to get back to it, though, and will continue fiddling with it :D I made a little cutscene at the beginning, which I couldn't do before. Neat learning experience.)
